sourcesContent:
/* eslint-disable */
import girl1 from '../assets/svg/testimonials/girl1.svg'
import girl2 from '../assets/svg/testimonials/girl2.svg'
import girl3 from '../assets/svg/testimonials/girl3.svg'
import boy1 from '../assets/svg/testimonials/boy1.svg'
import boy2 from '../assets/svg/testimonials/boy2.svg'
import boy3 from '../assets/svg/testimonials/boy3.svg'



export const testimonialsData = [
    {
        id: 1,
        name: 'Joshua Hutcheson',
        title: 'Software Engineer at Sealed Air',
        text: "I had the opportunity to work with Kruthika during her internship at SealedAir and she did a phenomenal job. She was tasked with a challenging project and exceeded expectations when it was complete. Kruthika displayed determination, a love for learning, technical understanding of front end development skills, presentation / communication skills, an exceptional work ethic, efficiency, and adaptability. Challenging situations did not stop her from thinking outside the box and creating solutions necessary for achieving the objectives.It was a privilege to work with her during her internship and cannot recommend her enough for a software engineering career.",
        image: boy2
    },
    {
        id: 2,
        name: 'Pugazhendhi Poyyamoli',
        title: 'Principal Software Engineer at Sealed Air',
        text: "I had the opportunity to work with Kruthika Kolume in her role as a Software Engineering Intern. During her time, Kruthika was able to learn quickly and adapt to new technologies relevant to our team's needs. She works well in a team and can effectively communicate technical and non-technical information. She was able to show case her strength by developing a Proof of concept for our team in a short span of time. Kruthika is truly a pleasure to work with. Wishing her all the best in future endeavors!",
        image: girl2
    },
    {
        id: 3,
        name: 'Sonali Tandon',
        title: 'Software Engineer at Sealed Air',
        text: "I had the privilege of mentoring Kruthika during her internship at Sealed Air, and one of the highlights of her time with us was her pivotal contribution to a React project which leveraged a headless AEM approach. Her skill set goes beyond technical prowess. Kruthika showcased an innate ability to tackle new challenges head-on. She displayed her self-driven nature by actively seeking out solutions through independent research, and her enthusiasm for acquiring new knowledge was evident throughout the project. Her proactive approach, combined with her quick adaptation to new concepts, truly makes her an exceptional talent. I am confident that Kruthika will thrive in any company she chooses to be a part of.",
        image: girl1
    },
    {
        id: 4,
        name: 'Veena SR',
        title: 'Software Engineer at Mercedes-Benz R&D India',
        text: "I worked with Kruthika on an application during her tenure at MBRDI. At this short span of time, she showed immense technical knowledge and communication skills. She was dedicated towards the project and contributed in resolving user issues on time. I can confidently recommend her to any project within her skill set.",
        image: boy1
    },
    {
        id: 5,
        name: 'Daniel Samuel',
        title: 'Data Architect',
        text: 'Kruthika is a reliable recourse I have worked with. She is resourceful and helpful. She likes to do challenging assignments. All the best for her future endeavors.',
        image: girl3
    },
]
